summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 25-26, 2019. It includes inmate count sheets, out-count forms, and inmate rosters, which are standard prison operational records. The significance lies in these being routine administrative documents from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Rosters
events.description: Multiple routine inmate population counts, out-counts, and assignment rosters conducted throughout the day at MCC New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: These are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative records (count sheets, out-count forms, inmate rosters) from July 25-26, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed on an inmate roster dated July 26, 2019, with an assignment code 'ATTY' and housing unit 'H01-OO1L'.
Several inmates have work order codes or assignments marked 'SUICIDE OR', indicating possible suicide watch or related protocols.
The documents show the routine operational procedures for tracking inmate population and movements within the MCC New York facility.
